action_items.task: Revise the performance review template to include more open-ended questions about growth, career aspirations, and impact.
Schedule focus groups with 5-6 managers to get input on the template revision.
Create a manager's guide to giving effective feedback, including examples of good and bad feedback.
Book a conference room for the manager training workshop.
Send out the calendar invite for the manager training.
Draft an email announcement for employees about the performance review timeline.
Create an FAQ document for employees.

decisions.context: To process compensation changes for January 1st.
decisions.decision: Complete all performance reviews by December 20th.

decisions.context: For processing before the December 20th deadline.
decisions.decision: Managers need to submit their reviews to HR by December 13th.

decisions.context: To allow employees two weeks for self-assessments.
decisions.decision: Launch the self-assessment phase on November 11th.

decisions.context: Two weeks after the launch date of November 11th.
To address feedback that it was too focused on ratings and not enough on development.

decisions.decision: Conduct manager training as a 90-minute group workshop.

decisions.context: Selected date for the group training session.
decisions.decision: Manager training will be held on November 8th.

decisions.context: To inform staff about the review process and timeline.
decisions.decision: Communicate the timeline to all employees via email announcement.

decisions.context: To address common questions about the review process.
decisions.decision: Include an FAQ document with the employee communication.

key_points: Establishing a clear timeline for reviews and compensation changes.
Updating the performance review template to focus on development.
The need for manager training on the new template.
Communicating the process and timeline to all employees.
Creating supporting materials for managers (feedback guide) and employees (FAQ).
summary.tldr: The team discussed the upcoming year-end performance review process, establishing a timeline and agreeing to update the review template to focus more on development and less on ratings. Key actions include revising the template, conducting manager training, and communicating the timeline to employees.
